subject: Early Bird Deadline - Only 1 week left
body:
To ensure you receive future Heart&Stroke Lottery emails, please add lottery@e.heartandstroke.ca to your address book.If this e-mail does not display properly, please Click here.














With 3 Million Dollar Grand Prizes that let you choose $1 million cash or the $1 million cottage package, the Heart&Stroke Lottery could be your ticket to a worry-free life. Of course, becoming a millionaire takes getting used to, so we've created the resignation letters below to give you a head start. Pick one and fill in the blanks – but don't give it to your boss until after you've won! 










Share the wealth - Send this to a friend to see how they'd quit!
















If you have already bought a ticket, thank you for helping the Heart and Stroke Foundation get results that save lives.

To forward to a friend please click here.

If you've received this message and want to be added to our list please click here to subscribe online.
Odds of winning are approx. 1 in 5. All inquiries on the odds of winning are to be made to the licensee prior to ticket purchase. Please refer to full brochure or visit www.heartandstroke.ca/lottery for cash outs, prize details, ticket issuing and draw information.
This message is intended for Ontario residents only.

Can't click on the links? Visit www.heartandstroke.ca/lottery to view the brochure online.

Lottery License #: P070155
